00051     typedef boost::uintmax_t doubledigit_t;

00058     typedef boost::uint_t<std::numeric_limits<doubledigit_t>::digits / 2>::fast
00059         digit_t;
00060 
00063     const size_t        bits_per_digit    = std::numeric_limits<digit_t>::digits;
00064     const digit_t       digit_hibit       = (digit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit-1));
00065     const doubledigit_t doubledigit_hibit = (doubledigit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit*2-1));
00066     const doubledigit_t digit_overflowbit = (doubledigit_t(1) << bits_per_digit);
00067     const digit_t       digit_mask        = digit_t(digit_overflowbit-1);

00079     struct base_random_generator {
00080         typedef unsigned int result_type;
00081         virtual result_type operator()()=0;
00082     };
00083 
00085     template <class T>
00086     struct random_generator: public base_random_generator {
00087         typedef boost::uniform_int<result_type> dist_t;
00088         typedef boost::variate_generator<T&, dist_t> gen_t;
00089         random_generator(T *g): genobj(g), gen(*g,
00090             dist_t((std::numeric_limits<result_type>::min)(),
00091                 (std::numeric_limits<result_type>::max)())) { }
00092         result_type operator()() { return gen(); }
00093         std::auto_ptr<T> genobj;
00094         gen_t gen;
00095     };
00096

00525 // Template function definitions

00540 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00541     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00542     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_signed<T> >::type*)
00543 {
00544     if (n >= 0) {
00545         if (static_cast<T>(n & detail::digit_mask) == n)
00546             _init(detail::digit_t(n));
00547         else _init(boost::uintmax_t(n));
00548     } else if (n == (std::numeric_limits<T>::min)()) {
00549         // Have to treat the minimum number carefully, because -n is not
00550         // what you'd think it is.
00551         _init(boost::uintmax_t(-(n+1)));
00552         _set_negative(true);
00553         --(*this);
00554     } else {
00555         _init(boost::uintmax_t(-n));
00556         _set_negative(true);
00557     }
00558 }
00559 
00573 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00574     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00575     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_unsigned<T> >::type*)
00576 {
00577     if (static_cast<T>(n & detail::digit_mask) == n)
00578         _init(detail::digit_t(n));
00579     else _init(boost::uintmax_t(n));
00580 }
00581 
00592 template <typename T>
00593 T to(const integer& n) {
00594     n._throw_if_nan();
00595     if (n < (std::numeric_limits<T>::min)()
00596         || n > (std::numeric_limits<T>::max)())
00597             throw too_big("value out of range for requested conversion");
00598 
00599     T rval=0;
00600     size_t len=n._get_length();
00601     for (size_t x=0; x<len; ++x)
00602         rval=static_cast<T>((rval * detail::digit_overflowbit)
00603             + n._get_digit(len-x-1));
00604     if (n.sign() < 0) rval *= -1;
00605     return rval;
00606 }

00621 template <typename T>
00622 void set_random_generator(T *gen) {
00623     detail::random_generator<T> *obj=new detail::random_generator<T>(gen);
00624     detail::set_random_generator(obj);
00625 }

00629 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00630 inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
00631     traits>& out, const xint::integer& n)
00632 {
00633     if (n.is_nan()) {
00634         out << detail::nan_text;
00635     } else {
00636         int base=((out.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 16
00637             : (out.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 8
00638             : 10);
00639         bool upperCase=(out.flags() & std::ios::uppercase ? true : false);
00640 
00641         if (out.flags() & std::ios::showbase) {
00642             if (n.sign() < 0) out << "-";
00643 
00644             if (base==16 && upperCase) out << "0X";
00645             else if (base==16) out << "0x";
00646             else if (base==8) out << "0";
00647 
00648             out << xint::to_string(abs(n), base, upperCase);
00649         } else {
00650             out << xint::to_string(n, base, upperCase);
00651         }
00652     }
00653     return out;
00654 }
00655 
00656 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00657 inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
00658     traits>& in, xint::integer& n)
00659 {
00660     int hex=(in.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 1 : 0;
00661     int dec=(in.flags() & std::ios::dec) ? 1 : 0;
00662     int oct=(in.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 1 : 0;
00663     int count=hex+dec+oct;
00664 
00665     size_t base=autobase;
00666     if (count==1) {
00667         if (hex) base=16;
00668         else if (oct) base=8;
00669         else base=10;
00670     } else if (count>1) base=10;
00671     // else auto-base
00672 
00673     std::string s;
00674     if (in.peek()=='+') {
00675         in.ignore();
00676     } else if (in.peek()=='-') {
00677         in.ignore();
00678         s.push_back('-');
00679     }
00680 
00681     if (base==autobase) {
00682         if (in.peek()=='0') {
00683             in.ignore();
00684             int c=in.peek();
00685             if (c=='x' || c=='X') {
00686                 in.ignore();
00687                 base=16;
00688             } else base=8;
00689         } else base=10;
00690     }
00691 
00692     if (in.peek()=='#') {
00693         // Must be either #NaN# or an error
00694         char buffer[6];
00695         std::streamsize size=in.readsome(buffer, 5);
00696         buffer[size]=0;
00697         std::string str(buffer);
00698 
00699         if (str==detail::nan_text) n=integer(not_a_number());
00700         else in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
00701     } else {
00702         while (in) {
00703             int c=in.peek();
00704             if ((base==8 && (c>='0' && c<='7')) ||
00705                 (base==10 && (c>='0' && c<='9')) ||
00706                 (base==16 && ((c>='0' && c<='9') || (c>='a' && c<='f') ||
00707                     (c>='A' && c<='F'))))
00708             {
00709                 in.ignore();
00710                 s.push_back(char(c));
00711             } else break;
00712         }
00713 
00714         token allow=allow_exceptions();
00715         try {
00716             xint::integer testValue=xint::from_string(s, base);
00717             n=testValue;
00718         } catch (xint::invalid_digit&) {
00719             // Catch invalid strings
00720             in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
00721         }
00722     }
00723 
00724     return in;
00725 }
